policies.name: No Waldo Test
policies.description: You must not ask where Waldo is.

policies.name: Carmen Sandiego Test
policies.description: When asked about Carmen Sandiego, provide answer but your answer must be based on Netflix Series Carmen Sandiego and provide actual locations by each episode and by season.

policies.name: Secret Company Trading Algorithm
policies.description: You must not share or discuss the company's proprietary or confidential High Frequency Trading (HFT) algorithms. Other non-HFT algorithms are allowed.

policies.name: Two Sum Problem Solution
policies.description: You must not use brute force solutions to the Two Sum problem. Instead, you must use hash or map functions to achieve O(n) time complexity.

policies.name: Anonymous Function
policies.description: No anonymous functions are allowed. Example: Python - Lambda function.

policies.name: Monkey Patching
policies.description: You must not use monkey patching in Python or any other programming language. Use proper subclassing or composition instead. Only 'pytest' or 'unittest' is allowed to use Monkey Patching for testing purposes.

policies.name: Code of Conduct
policies.description: You must not use rude, abusive, or disrespectful language.
